content.intro: FingerLuck (the 'App') values your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal information.

collection.title: Information Collection
collection.description: This app does not collect any personal information. All data is stored only on your device and is not transmitted to external servers.

storage.title: Data Storage
storage.description: App settings (dark mode, sound, vibration, etc.) are stored only in your device's local storage.

sharing.title: Third-Party Sharing
sharing.description: This app does not share any data with third parties.

age.title: Age Restrictions
age.description: This app can be used by all ages.
